description:
## Title

Describe this dashboard. Add links to other dashboards, monitors, wikis,  and docs to help your teammates. Markdown is supported.

- [This might link to a dashboard](#)
- [This might link to a wiki](#)
title: [Lyd] Database Performance

definition.content:
Expected Traffic during 2022 BTS:
* XX Web requests per minute
* XX Database requests per minute

During BTS 2021, high water mark was on [Sept 21](https://app.datadoghq.com/apm/service/handshake/rack.request?env=production&hostGroup=us-central1&panel_end=1645470077259&panel_paused=true&panel_start=1645466477259&topGraphs=latency%3Alatency%2CbreakdownAs%3Apercentage%2Cerrors%3Acount%2Chits%3Acount&start=1632200400000&end=1632286740000&paused=true):
* 63.4M Web Requests over the Day
* ~108K Web Requests / Minute

definition.title: Worker Batches Items Created by Index
Percentage Dead Rows by Table (with at least 50 dead rows)
Large Table (>1B) Projected Growth of Live Tuples
Index Scans by Table and Index Name
[WEB] Slowest Average Response Times by Endpoint
Latency on EDU Miniservice in env production
[ELASTICSEARCH] Serialization Average Query Count by Index

definition.content:
### Sidekiq Sequential Scans

[Seq Scans in all Sidekiq Workers](https://app.datadoghq.com/databases/samples?query=source%3Apostgres%20%40db.plan.definition%3A%2ASeq%2A%20%40db.application%3A%2Asidekiq%2A&agg_m=count&agg_q=%40db.statement&agg_t=count&dbType=PostgreSQL&sort_m=&sort_t=&stream_sort=%40db.plan.cost%3Adesc&top_n=50&top_o=top&viz=toplist&start=1645291335033&end=1645723335033&paused=false)

### Elasticsearch Sequential Scans

[Seq Scans in the Pubsub Indexer Deployment](https://app.datadoghq.com/databases/samples?query=source%3Apostgres%20%40db.application%3A%22bin%2Fpubsub_indexer%22%20%20%40db.plan.definition%3A%2ASeq%2A&agg_m=count&agg_q=%40db.statement&agg_t=count&dbType=PostgreSQL&sort_m=&sort_t=&stream_sort=%40db.plan.cost%3Adesc&top_n=50&top_o=top&viz=toplist&start=1645285837689&end=1645717837689&paused=false)

[Seq Scans in the Elasticsearch Worker Deployment](https://app.datadoghq.com/databases/samples?query=source%3Apostgres%20%40db.application%3A%22bin%2Felasticsearch_indexer_worker%22%20%40db.plan.definition%3A%2ASeq%2A&agg_m=count&agg_q=%40db.statement&agg_t=count&dbType=PostgreSQL&sort_m=&sort_t=&stream_sort=%40db.plan.cost%3Adesc&top_n=50&top_o=top&viz=toplist&start=1645287914413&end=1645719914413&paused=false)
